SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO ,BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_TITLE ,USER_ID ,B.CREATE_DATE ,B.COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO ,BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_TITLE ,USER_ID ,B.CREATE_DATE ,B.COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND B.CREATE_DATE >= SYSDATE - INTERVAL '30' DAY ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
